import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Card from './card.js'; import hiltonweb from './images/hilotn-web-600.png'; import hiltoniphone from './images/hilotn-iphone-600.png'; import fractalweb from './images/fractal-web-600.png'; import pep from './images/pep-ipad-600.png'; import connectedroom from './images/hilton-connectedroom-600.png'; import beverlyhiltonweb from './images/beverlyhilton-web-600.png'; import stjudeweb from './images/stjude-org-600.png'; import stjudeheroes from './images/stjude-heroes-600.png'; import stjudedreamhome from './images/stjude-dreamhome-600.png'; class Work extends Component{ render(){ return (
Currently

I lead the Design and User Experience teams at Hilton.

These case studies represent the work of hundreds of people. I'll try to highlight the role I and the teams that i lead played in each

Previously

I lead the UX Design and UI Dev teams at ALSAC/St. Jude

Stjude.org
Partnering with a design team from the hospital, Stjude.org was one of the largest projects our team delivered Stjude.org *has definitely been updated since i worked on this
St. Jude Heroes
One of my primary focuses at ALSAC was peer to peer findraising. The Memphis Marathon was the single largest of those events St. Jude Memphis Marathon *has definitely been updated since i worked on this
St. Jude Dreamhome
;
A great change to lead a design studio where most of our prototype validation was with our own legal depatment. St. Jude Dreamhome Site *has definitely been updated since i worked on this
) } } export default Work;
